text: For Pete's Sake is a 1974 American screwball comedy movie directed by Peter Yates and stars Barbra Streisand, Estelle Parsons, Michael Sarrazin, Molly Picon. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates
title: For Pete's Sake (movie)
